s.text: But what will become of The New Yorker ? During Tina's tenure, the magazine's editors were always talking about "the mix"--the never-ending struggle to strike the right balance between the slashy and the serious.

But what will become of The New Yorker ? During Tina's tenure, the magazine's editors were always talking about "the mix"--the never-ending struggle to strike the right balance between the slashy and the serious.

But what will become of The New Yorker ? During Tina's tenure, the magazine's editors were always talking about "the mix"--the never-ending struggle to strike the right balance between the slashy and the serious.
As for who will preside over this dark day in New Yorker history, we can only report what we have gleaned from the rumor mill over on 43rd Street.
Dark horses inside the magazine include Remnick and Kurt Andersen.
